name: IoTitude
body: ## Vision of the Company We provide high performance real time solutions to sewer and drain water networks. With our service you can maintain and monitor your pipe network and collect accurate data from water flow to water levels and much more! ####Customer Testimonials "No more flooding sewer water on our streets! Higly recommended service" _John Kauffman, Mayor of the IOTCity_ "Now I can monitor when our neighbourhood uses toilets and shower in realtime. It makes my life so much more interesting!" _Elizabeth Tallbot, 67, Citizen of the IOTCity_ ## Workers of the Company | Face | Name | Job title | Linkedin | GitHub | | :-- | :--- | :--- | :--: | :--: | | | Kantalainen Emmi | Graphic & Game designer | [Link](https://fi.linkedin.com/in/emmi-kantalainen-3148ab107 "Link to Linkedin profile") | - | | | Kivistö Vesa | Junior Developer, Junior IOT developer | [Link](https://www.linkedin.com/in/vesa-kivist%C3%B6-62606b121 "Link to Linkedin profile") | - | | | Kuukkanen Janne | Junior Developer, IOT developer | - | [Link](https://github.com/JanKuukkanen "Link to GitHub profile") | | | Laube-Pohto Ruben | Junior Developer, Junior Mobile/Web Developer | [Link](https://www.linkedin.com/in/ruben-laube-pohto-b7906b121 "Link to Linkedin profile") | - | | | Mäkinen Lauri | Junior Developer, Junior Business Analyst | [Link](https://fi.linkedin.com/in/makinenlauri "Link to Linkedin profile") | [Link](https://github.com/laurima "Link to GitHub profile") | | | Pöyhönen Jaakko | Junior Developer | [Link](https://www.linkedin.com/in/jaakko-p%C3%B6yh%C3%B6nen-947257121 "Link to Linkedin profile") | - | | | Räisänen Sanna | Junior Developer, Junior/Amateur Statistician | [Link](https://www.linkedin.com/in/sanna-r%C3%A4is%C3%A4nen-70199a108 "Link to Linkedin profile") | - | | | Saukonoja Timo | Junior Developer, Junior IOT developer | [Link](https://fi.linkedin.com/in/timosaukonoja "Link to Linkedin profile") | - | ####For more information about our company please check out our [wiki site](https://github.com/JAMK-IT/iot-city/wiki "IoTitude website")
